page.title: 06ROMAN RIVER VALLEY
page.content: In a survey published in 1974 by the Colchester Civic Society, details were given of the abundant natural and historical resources of the Roman River Valley. It was declared a Conservation Zone by Essex County Council in 1976. Conservation work is carried out by volunteers organised into three working groups concerned with nature conservation, recreation and landscape management and the archaeological and historic aspect. The Nature Conservation Group _ have spent five years surveying and recording the flora and fauna in detail and have published an illustrated booklet. The Recreation and Landscape Group _ work on restoring footpaths. The Archaeological and Historical Group _ studying the local history.
